name: RunningBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask running buddy to give me the plan for week five”
”Alexa, ask running buddy for what is the plan for week three”
”Alexa, ask running buddy what should i do in week two”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: running buddy
des:
Couch to 5 Kilometres (c25k) is a fantastic running program by Josh Clark that is designed to get just about anyone from the couch to running 5 kilometers in just 9 weeks. 

This is designed primarily for first time runners or runners who want to get back to running after a break.

The workout is based on running and walking. But, the duration and the pattern varies every week as you gain strength. 

It is advised to works out three times a week on alternate days. Workout will last between 30 and 40 minutes. 

This skill will give you the plan for a particular week that you ask for. 
Example: Alexa, ask running buddy to give the plan for week five. 
Alexa will give you the workout plan for week five.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
